description.raw:
This pull request makes a few changes to `SDFFeatures` related to joint creation needed for integration with ign-gazebo:

* Use Joint::ThreadPitch (SDF DOM interface) instead of accessing it through `sdf::Element`.
    This requires sdformat [pull request #471](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/pull-requests/471)
* Adds support for joints with a "world" parent. Joints with a "world" child are not currently supported.
* Use default property values for a joint axis if it's not specified in SDF. This is to replicate the behavior of Gazebo.
* Enforce joint limits.
description.html:
This pull request makes a few changes to SDFFeatures related to joint creation needed for integration with ign-gazebo:

  • Use Joint::ThreadPitch (SDF DOM interface) instead of accessing it through sdf::Element. This requires sdformat pull request #471
  • Adds support for joints with a "world" parent. Joints with a "world" child are not currently supported.
  • Use default property values for a joint axis if it's not specified in SDF. This is to replicate the behavior of Gazebo.
  • Enforce joint limits.

title.raw: Changes to SDF based joint creation for use with ign-gazebo.
title.html: Changes to SDF based joint creation for use with ign-gazebo.
